articles.author: Kate Mayberry
articles.title: China reports 573 new COVID-19 cases: Live updates
articles.description: China continues to battle virus that has spread around the world with hot-spots in Europe and the Middle East.
articles.content:
Hello and welcome to Al Jazeera's continuing coverage of the coronavirus.
This is Kate Mayberry keeping track of the latest developments on the outbreak from our bureau in Kuala Lumpur.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China says more than half of coronavirus patients cured
articles.description: In China, 573 new infections have been recorded but health authorities insist they are getting on top of the outbreak.
articles.content:
The United States has raised travel warnings after recording its first coronavirus death in Washington state. Thailand and Australia have also reported their first fatalities.

articles.author: Linus Unah
articles.title: 'Nigeria will deal with this': High alert after coronavirus case
articles.description: Experts say Nigeria is prepared to contain new virus following a successful response to Ebola more than five years ago.
articles.content: Abuja, Nigeria - Health authorities in Nigeria are ramping up efforts to detect and contain the new coronavirus after Africa's most populous country confirmed its first case, calling on citizens to avoid panicking or spreading unverified information about the… [+6904 chars]

articles.author: Shawn Yuan
articles.title: How China is using AI and big data to combat coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: Authorities in China step up surveillance and roll out new artificial intelligence tools to fight deadly epidemic.
articles.content: Chengdu, China - Sitting at the entrance of Chengdu's East Railway Station, Fu Guobin stared at a screen displaying infrared images of people passing through the station's gates. As each person entered, a number popped up next to their image indicating their … [+7615 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Qatar bans travellers from Egypt over coronavirus fears
articles.description: Egypt reported its first coronavirus case on February 14, saying the infected person was a foreign national.
articles.content:
Authorities in Qatar have temporarily banned all arrivals from Egypt, except Qatari citizens, over fears of the spread of deadly coronavirus.
"As a public health measure, the State of Qatar has imposed a temporary entrance restriction to its territories on a… [+2550 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Philippines: Church attendance hits low over coronavirus fears
articles.description: Fears over coronavirus outbreak keep people away from Sunday mass services in the country with the largest Roman Catholic community in Asia.
articles.content:
The Philippines is home to the largest Roman Catholic community in Asia, and churches can traditionally rely on a strong showing for Sunday mass services.
But fears over a coronavirus spread have had a dramatic effect on attendance.
